metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15232 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
libjpeg-turbo 1.5.2 has a NULL Pointer Dereference in jdpostct.c and jquant1.c via a crafted JPEG file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libturbojpeg - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> pull 182 was superseded by the commit below

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1').
